page.title: 03Traffic Survey (6)
page.content: The{fourth year}children held a traffic survey on{Abbey Rd.}It started at{7am}and finished at{7pm.}The {weather}was very cold. There was{snow on the ground but the{road was clear. During the day about{4,500 vehicles passed our checkpoint. Of these{4,310 were cars. The{busiest}times were around 8am and 5pm. We think this is because people were going to and from work. Between 8am and 8.15am 200 cars passed our checkpoint. Between 5pm and 5.15pm 185 cars passed. A total of 385 cars in these two periods. The{peak for commercial vehicles}was between 1pm and 1.15pm with a total of 21 passing. At 9am, 12 noon and 3.30pm about 120 pedestrians were recorded.
